name: Sonder Agency
description:
Newly established in January 2016, we are a rapidly growing digital agency dedicated to creative solution hunting.
Born from the ten-year-old agency, Graphic Fusion, Sonder has evolved, redefining every aspect of our brand - from embodying design evolution down to our own font to cultivating a culture of passion for our craft.
We offer a wide range of services, including multimedia production, interactive design, brand development, and digital marketing.
